definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: You ever hear white people callin' each other honky all the time?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时辰听过白人互相等号“白鬼”吗，兄弟？

sentences.english: You ever hear white people callin' each other "honky" all the time?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候听过白人互相称呼“白鬼”吗，兄弟？

sentences.english: You ever hear white people callin' each other "honky" all the time?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候听过白人互相称呼“白鬼”吗，兄弟？

sentences.english: You think white people go around calling each other honkies all day, man?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候听过白人成天互相称呼“白鬼”？

definition: black devil (derogatory term for black or African person)
little demon (term of endearment for a child)/mischievous child/imp
variant of 榔頭|榔头[lang2 tou5]
aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
Two deities, one short, one tall, chained together at the ankle, responsible for rewarding the good and punishing the bad
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
night demon (malign spirit believed to plague people during sleep)
